title: Numerical Modelling
content: Numerical Modelling#This section covers various physical problems modelled using FEniCSx, a software-based tool to solve partial differential equations.

title: About
content: About#I am currently a master’s student in mechanical engineering at Western University. My research focuses on the mechanical and thermal simulation of the Western Skylark CubeSat.

title: Thermal
content:
Thermal Numerical Modelling#Simulation of thermal problems using FEniCSx
\( \pi(x) \)$$ f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi),e^{2 \pi i \xi x},d\xi $$
